title: Changes of Circulating Tumor Cells Expressing CD90 and EpCAM in Early-Phase of Atezolizumab and Bevacizumab for Hepatocellular Carcinoma
content:
Publication date: Available online 10 July 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Takuto Nosaka, Yosuke Murata, Yu Akazawa, Kazuto Takahashi, Tatsushi Naito, Hidetaka Matsuda, Masahiro Ohtani, Yasunari Nakamoto
